ccg-setinfo.name: Tenth Anniversary
ccg-setinfo.game: Star Trek Collectible Card Game: Second Edition

card.name: Benjamin Sisko (Shipwright)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Honor {SD}Navigation Commander: Baraka. While this personnel is aboard a {baj} ship, it is Range+1.

card.name: Borg Queen (Perfectionist)
card.text: {SD}3 Leadership {SD}Treachery Commander: Queen's Borg Cube. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each personnel you command but do not own cannot be stopped.

card.name: Dukat (True Cardassian)
card.text: {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Programming {SD}Security Commander: Naprem. When an engagement involving this personnel ends, the ship he is aboard and each of your {car} personnel aboard it are not stopped. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn.

card.name: Kudak'Etan (Arrogant First)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer Alpha. Commander: U.S.S. Defiant. Order - Discard a Vorta from hand to place this personnel and any number of your Jem'Hadar present aboard a ship at the same mission.

card.name: Data (Commanding Officer)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Physics {SD}Programming Commander: U.S.S. Southerland. Order - Discard a card from hand to name a card. When an opponent plays that card, score 5 points. This effect lasts until the start of your next turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Jean-Luc Picard (Starship Captain)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Honor {SD}Law {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer Commander: U.S.S. Enterprise-D. Order - This personnel loses Diplomacy, Law and Navigation and gains Anthropology, Archaeology and Science until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Gowron (Sole Leader of the Empire)
card.text: {SD}Honor {SD}Law {SD}2 Leadership {SD}Security Chancellor. Commander: I.K.S. Bortas. When your Honor Klingon is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a Treachery Klingon from hand to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Arctus Baran (Treasure Seeker)
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Officer {SD}Security {SD}Treachery Commander: Fortune. Smuggler. Thief. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may download an Artifact card and place it in your core (if it is an event) or present with this personnel (if it is an equipment).

card.name: Velal (Reluctant Aggressor)
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Security Commander: Rovaran. General. When the player on your right attempts this mission, if you command a Maneuver event, you may draw an extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

card.name: Baraka
card.text: Order - Lose 5 points to make this ship Range +10 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Queen's Borg Cube
card.text: You may use a card which begins an engagement to begin one involving this ship even if it is at a headquarters mission.

card.name: Naprem
card.text: Cloaking Device. While this ship is at an opponent's planet mission, if your personnel is on that planet, he or she is an Infiltrator.

card.name: U.S.S. Defiant (Commandeered Warship)
card.text: Cloaking Device. To staff this ship, you must have an Engineer personnel aboard. Order - If this ship is staffed and at your mission, stop this ship to take two overcome dilemmas from beneath that mission and place them face up beneath your {AQ} mission.

card.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D (Explorer)
card.text: When you complete a space mission requiring Diplomacy, if this ship is at that mission, score 10 points.

card.name: U.S.S. Sutherland
card.text: When you fail a mission attempt at a space mission, if this ship is at that mission, you may discard three cards from hand to place the top card of an opponent's dilemma pile face up beneath this mission. If you do this, you cannot attempt this mission again this turn.

card.name: I.K.S. Bortas
card.text: Cloaking Device. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a card from hand to download a Maneuver event.

card.name: Fortune (Raider for Hire)
card.text: While your Treachery personnel is aboard this ship, he or she is attributes +1 for each Artifact you command (limit +3).

card.name: Rovaran
card.text: Cloaking Device. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may examine the loser's hand and choose a card to be removed from the game. Order - Discard a Maneuver card from hand to begin an engagement involving this ship.
